You may stay with us. But we're in SC. That's a standing offer to *anyone*!!!

803 776 4849

Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org


-----Original Message-----
From: Denise Deeves <we3deeves@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wed, 31 Aug 2005 17:53:27 -0000
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] HURRICANE Help Needed from New Orleans member


Hi,

Denise, who lives north of NO has asked me to post a message. If anyone can
help them,
it would be GREATLY appreciated. Alison abzb@... Here's the
message:

We've been staying to Houston and don't have a hotel room anymore so we're
trying to get
into the Parish today. If we can't, is there anyone in the Baton Rouge area who
could be a
back up for us to find us shelter. You can call Alison @ 310 828-5788 (home) or

310 403-5788 (cell) and she can relay the message to me (Denise).

Thank you all for your help.

Denise
